thread.section_title: Maison Albar Hotel Opera Diamond, BW Premier Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Supersatisfied despite some complications
thread.title_full: Supersatisfied despite some complications - Review of Maison Albar Hotel Opera Diamond, BW Premier Collection, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Eliasbebo
title: Supersatisfied despite some complications
text: Great service from the start, really nice decorated lobby and just a pleasant feeling the moment we entered the hotel. Our room was well over our expectations, comfortable bed, a large mirror in the ceiling that gave the room a nice touch and a fresh and cozy bathroom. Our stay all and all was great even though there was an incident with a firealarm in the middle of the night that lead to a power-outtage. Had to wait an hour for it to get fixed. But those things happen and the hotel personnel handled it well.
